title: Sleep No More (Eve Duncan #15)  by Iris Johansen  EPUB EN
description:
Forensic sculptor Eve Duncan knows what it's 
like to be haunted by the past.  For years after 
her daughter Bonnie was stolen from her, she 
fought for closure.  But now as she's striving 
to begin anew, she can't shake the feeling that 
something terrible is about to happenÃ¢â‚¬â€or maybe 
already has.  When her mother, Sandra, asks for 
help in finding a missing friend named Beth 
Avery, Eve is sure that she's hiding something.  
ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s odd that Sandra would get involved at all, 
and the fact that she adamantly refuses to go to 
the police for help reinforces EveÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s suspicions 
that something is very wrong. Eve learns that 
Beth has been locked away in a mental hospital 
for years, which makes it even harder to 
understand how she could have disappeared. 

As Sandra reluctantly reveals small pieces of 
the truth about Beth's identity, Eve is shocked 
to discover that their lives are strangely 
entwined, and Beth's disappearance now puts them 
all in grave danger. Desperate, Eve enlists a 
secret weapon to pick up Beth's trail: rogue 
profiler, Kendra Michaels. With an uncanny 
ability to detect clues and solve puzzles, Kendra 
begins to uncover the bizarre circumstances of 
Beth's escape from what should have been the 
safety of her hospital room. Beth is on the run, 
and as her mind clears--detoxing from the drugs 
that have held her prisoner--she begins to see 
the threads of a twisted plot within the powerful 
Avery family, threatening to destroy Beth and 
anyone else who might jeopardize the high-stakes 
game that is already in play. 


 
Sleep No More (Eve Duncan #15)
By Iris Johansen
